name: IndexedConversionOptions
shortdesc: Options for converting an RGB image to an indexed color model.

property.name: colors
property.shortdesc: The number of colors in the palette. Not valid for all palette types.

property.name: forced
property.shortdesc: The type of colors to force into the color palette.

property.name: transparency
property.shortdesc: If true, preserves transparent areas of the image during conversion to GIF format.

property.name: ditherAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount of dither. Valid only when 'dither' = diffusion.

property.name: preserveExactColors
property.shortdesc: If true, protects colors in the image that contain entries in the color table from being dithered. Valid only when 'dither' = diffusion.

property.name: matte
property.shortdesc: The color to use to fill anti-aliased edges adjacent to transparent areas of the image. When transparency = false, the matte color is applied to transparent areas.
